Title: Key Decisions to Drive Business Success
Description:
Today, we hear about:

•       How to help your team members grow personally and professionally

•       A caller who has a thriving debt-free business with over $3.6 million of equipment

•       The six drivers of a truly successful business

•       What to do when buying a company and the previous owner wants to continue working with the team
